member.name: T:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter
member.summary: The core of adding a custom character to be registered with . You must derive a class from this to represent the character to add.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.#ctor(System.String,SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.FormatVersion,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a new custom character.
member.param: The name of the custom character, containing only alphanumericals, underscores, and spaces.
The version this mod was first built with.

The character to copy creatures and world state from. The value should be 0 (survivor), 1 (monk) or 2 (hunter). Values outside of this range are allowed, but the vanilla game's world files are not set up to use them correctly.
member.remarks: The name of this character must be unique; other mods that add a character of this same name will throw an exception when registering their character. If your name is likely to cause conflicts (such as any of the vanilla achievement names), then consider prefixing your player's name with some other text, like the author's name.
member.exception: Thrown when input name is null.
Thrown when input name is empty or contains illegal characters.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.DevMode
member.summary: Enables or disables developer mode.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.SlugcatIndex
member.summary: The slugcat index of this character.
member.remarks: Use this value only when absolutely necessary. This may be -1, even when in a story game, and may change each time the game is launched.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.StartRoom
member.summary: The room that this player begins in when starting a new game. Any values other than the default, "SU_C04", may need code to determine where to place the player.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.Prepare
member.summary: Called once as a game starts from the select screen or multiplayer menu.
member.remarks: This is called as soon possible, the moment that user's character choice is locked in. Effects that must apply before the instance is created may be done here.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.Enable
member.summary: Called once when a game is started as this character.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.Disable
member.summary: Called once when a game is ended as this character.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.GetStats(SlugcatStats)
member.summary: Modifies a instance to contain the stats for this character.
member.remarks: By default, this is the exact same as Survivor's stats. Make sure to take into account.
member.param: The instance of to modify.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.GetFoodMeter(System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Get the amount of food that this character needs to sleep and the total amount that it can hold. Defaults to Survivor's food meter.
member.remarks: Changing this will result in the tutorial text being incorrect. Consider changing it, or disabling it by setting to false.
member.param: The amount of food that this character can hold.
The amount of food that this character needs to sleep.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.CanEatMeat(Player,Creature)
member.summary: Checks whether or not this player can eat the meat of a certain creature. By default, this returns the same as the vanilla game, which is true for dead centipedes and false for all other creatures.
member.param: The player that is trying to eat.
The creature that the player is tring to eat.
member.returns: True if the creature can be eaten, false otherwise.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.QuarterFood
member.summary: True if this character receives a quarter pips for non-meat foods. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.GatesPermanentlyUnlock
member.summary: True if karma gates unlock permanently for this character, such as when playing as Monk. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.GetCycleLength
member.summary: Gets how many minutes this cycle should last. Defaults to null.
member.returns: The number of minutes the cycle should last, or null to use the default.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.CanSkipTempleGuards
member.summary: True if this character can skip the temple guardians with a flashbang. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.HasGuideOverseer
member.summary: True if the tutorial overseer follows this character. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.HasDreams
member.summary: True if dreams can play when this character is selected. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.Name
member.summary: The name of the character.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.DisplayName
member.summary: The name to display to the user, such as on the player select screen.
member.remarks: Defaults to your character's internal name. This should start with "The", and the first letter of each word should be capitalized.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.Description
member.summary: The description of this SlugBase character to be displayed on the player select screen. All instances of "<LINE>" will be replaced with a line break.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.SlugcatColor
member.summary: Get the color used for this character's UI and in-game sprites.
member.returns: The color to use, or null to use the default for this save slot.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.CreateNewSave(PlayerProgression)
member.summary: Creates an empty save state for this character.
member.remarks: If your character needs to save more data, this may be overridden to return a new instance of a child class of .

member.name: P:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.DefaultResourcePath
member.summary: Gets the default directory that contains resources for this character.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.GetResource(System.String[])
member.summary: Gets a stream containing the specified resource. By default this reads from a file inside of .
member.remarks: This is intended to be overridden to load from different locations, such as from embedded resources via . This should return null if the resource does not exist, or there was a problem accessing the resource. Make sure to dispose of it!
member.param: The relative location of the resource.
member.returns: A stream of data for the specified resource, or null if the resource does not exist.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.GetStringResource(System.String[])
member.summary: Gets a resource, then decodes it as a UTF-8 string.
member.param: The relative location of the resource.
member.returns: A string if the resource was found, or null if the resource does not exist or was not valid UTF-8.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.BuildScene(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves information about a custom scene.
member.remarks:
This is intended to be overridden if you need more control over which images are loaded in a scene. For example, this may be changed to enable or disable background elements based on save state.
The returned images should be ordered from lowest to highest depth.
member.param: The name of the scene to build.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.BuildSlideshow(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves information about a custom slideshow.
member.remarks: This is intended to be overridden if you need to change which images are loaded for a slideshow without changing the JSON file.
member.param: The name of the slideshow to build.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.HasScene(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether or not this player defines a custom scene.
member.param: The name of the scene to check for.
member.returns: True if the scene exists, false if it does not.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.HasSlideshow(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether or not this player defines a custom slideshow.
member.param: The name of the slideshow to check for.
member.returns: True if the slideshow exists, false if it does not.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.OverrideNextScene(System.String,SlugBase.SceneImageFilter)
member.summary: Replaces the next with a scene loaded from this character's resources. may be used to abort this.
member.param: The name of the scene to load.
A delegate that returns true for each image that should be shown in the scene, or null to show all.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.ClearSceneOverride
member.summary: Aborts a scene override from .

member.name: T:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.FormatVersion
member.summary: Indicates which version this mod was built with.
member.remarks: This is intended to help preserve backwards compatibility, should any otherwise breaking changes apply to new versions. When first creating a mod, you should always use the most recent version.

member.name: F:SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter.FormatVersion.V1
member.summary: The current version. Use this one.

member.name: T:SlugBase.CustomSaveState
member.summary: Contains the save data for any characters added through SlugBase.
member.remarks: If you need to save extra data for your character, you should create a class that inherits from this.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomSaveState.#ctor(PlayerProgression,SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter)
member.summary: Creates a new representation of a SlugBase character's save state.
member.param: The instance to attach this save state to.
The SlugBase character that owns this save state.

member.name: P:SlugBase.CustomSaveState.Character
member.summary: The that owns this save state.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomSaveState.Save(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Converts save data for this character to strings to enter into a dictionary. This data is not saved when the player dies.
member.remarks: should be overridden to handle the same values.
member.param: The empty dictionary to add your data to.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomSaveState.Load(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Loads saved data for this character from entries in a dictionary. This data is loaded from the last time the player survived a cycle.
member.remarks: should be overridden to handle the same values.
member.param: The dictionary to read your data from.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomSaveState.SavePermanent(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts death-persistant save data for this character to strings to enter into a dictionary. This data is not reset when the player dies.
member.remarks:
Saved values that change on quit or death should be changed here. This is saved as a death once when starting the cycle, so quitting the game early counts as a death if it is not overwritten by the end of the cycle.
should be overridden to handle the same values.
member.param: The empty dictionary to add your data to.
True if the player has quit or died.
True if the player has quit.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomSaveState.LoadPermanent(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Loads death-persistant saved data for this character from entries in a dictionary. This data is not reset when the player dies.
member.remarks: should be overridden to handle the same values.
member.param: The dictionary to read your data from.

member.name: T:SlugBase.CustomScene
member.summary: Represents a scene added by a SlugBase character.

member.name: P:SlugBase.CustomScene.Images
member.summary: The images this scene contains.

member.name: P:SlugBase.CustomScene.Owner
member.summary: The character that this scene was loaded from.

member.name: P:SlugBase.CustomScene.Name
member.summary: This scene's name.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomScene.#ctor(SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an empty scene.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomScene.#ctor(SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a scene from a JSON string.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomScene.#ctor(SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Creates a scene from a JSON object.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomScene.InsertImage(SlugBase.SceneImage)
member.summary: Inserts an image into the list according to its depth.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomScene.GetProperty``1(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a named value from this scene's JSON, or the type's default value if does not exist. These may be defined by the engine (see remarks), or by another mod.
member.remarks:
This may defined by your mod, or be one of several built-in tags:
MarkX (float) The X position of the default mark of communication.
MarkY (float) The Y position of the default mark of communication.
GlowX (float) The X position of the default player glow.
GlowY (float) The Y position of the default player glow.
SlugcatDepth (float) The depth of the slugcat in the select screen. This is used when positioning the mark and glow.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomScene.SetProperty(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Attaches a named value to this scene.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomScene.ToString
member.summary: Creates a JSON string that represents this object.
member.returns: A JSON string.

member.name: M:SlugBase.CustomScene.ApplyFilter(SlugBase.SceneImageFilter)
member.summary: Disables images in this scene based on a filter.
member.param: A delegate that returns false for any images that should be hidden.

member.name: T:SlugBase.SceneImage
member.summary: Represents a single image in a .
member.remarks: This class may be inherited if a scene image requires more functionality than can provide. Consider using to add illustrations manually.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SceneImage.AssetName
member.summary: The name of the file containing the image.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SceneImage.Owner
member.summary: The scene this image is a part of.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SceneImage.Pos
member.summary: The position of the bottom left of this image

member.name: P:SlugBase.SceneImage.Depth
member.summary: How far into the screen this illustration should be drawn. The higher this value, the less this image moves when the mouse is moved. This should be less than zero if the image is flat.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SceneImage.Enabled
member.summary: True if this image should be shown in the scene, false otherwise. This has no effect once the scene's illustrations have been loaded.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SceneImage.ShouldBeSaved
member.summary: True if this image should be saved to the scene. This does not affect . Defaults to true.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SceneImage.DisplayName
member.summary: The name to display when showing this image in the scene editor.

member.name: P:SlugBase.SceneImage.AlphaKeys
member.summary: A list of alpha keyframes. This may be null.
member.remarks: X values correspond to time, Y values correspond to this image's alpha at this time. Time values range from 0 to 1. Keyframes will be linearly interpolated between during a slideshow.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SceneImage.#ctor(SlugBase.CustomScene)
member.summary: Creates a blank scene image.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SceneImage.#ctor(SlugBase.CustomScene,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a scene image from a JSON string.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SceneImage.#ctor(SlugBase.CustomScene,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Creates a scene image from a JSON object.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SceneImage.ToString
member.summary: Converts this image into a JSON string.
member.returns: A JSON string.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SceneImage.AlphaAtTime(System.Single)
member.summary: Finds the alpha of this image at by sampling from .
member.param: The time to sample at, typically between 0 and 1.
member.returns: The alpha that this image should have at this point. This does not take other alpha modifiers into account.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SceneImage.OnSave(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Called before a scene is saved.
member.param: A JSON object representing the scene to be saved.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SceneImage.OnBuild(Menu.MenuScene)
member.summary: Called when this image's graphics should be added to a scene. Defaults to true.
member.remarks: This may be overridden to add graphics to the scene without using a .
member.returns: True if this image should create a .

member.name: M:SlugBase.SceneImage.GetProperty``1(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a named value from this image's JSON, or the type's default value if does not exist. These may be defined by the engine (see remarks), or by another mod.
member.remarks:
This may defined by your mod, or be one of several built-in tags:
Mark (bool) This image only appears on the select screen if the player has the mark of communication.
Glow (bool) True if this image should only appear on the select screen if the player is glowing.
Shader (string) Set this image to use the specified shader. These are first checked against . If the image is flat or there is no corresponding MenuShader, then the shader with this name is used.
Flatmode (bool) True if this image should only appear in flat mode, and all others without it will be hidden in flat mode. This should be used in conjunction with a less than zero.
Crisp (bool) True to disable antialiasing for this image.
Focus (bool) Marks this image as a candidate for camera focus. If no images are marked as such, then the camera will occasionally focus at the depth of a random image.
Alpha (float) Sets this image's opacity. This value should be between 0 and 1, inclusive.
Fade (float) This image will fade out when the map is opened on the sleep and death screens.
member.returns: An instance of , or 's default value if no matching key was found.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SceneImage.SetProperty(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Attaches a named value to this image.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SceneImage.GetTempProperty``1(System.String)
member.summary: Like , but only for temporary values.
member.returns: An instance of , or 's default value if no matching key was found.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SceneImage.SetTempProperty(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Attaches a temporary value to this image. This will not be saved with the scene.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SceneImage.HasTag(System.String)
member.summary: Check if this image has the specified property, and that the property's value is not false.

member.name: T:SlugBase.SaveManager
member.summary: Manages save data for SlugBase characters.
member.remarks: Save data for different SlugBase characters is saved to separate files. This ensures that one character's save game will never be played by another character and that, after uninstalling SlugBase, the vanilla game will not try to load modded saves.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SaveManager.GetSaveFileDirectory
member.summary: Gets the path that contains all SlugBase character save files.
member.returns: An absolute path to the save file directory.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SaveManager.GetSaveFilePath(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the path to a specific SlugBase character's save file.
member.param: The name of the SlugBase character.
The game's current save slot.
member.returns: An absolute path to the save file.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SaveManager.HasCustomSaveData(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks for a save file for a specific SlugBase character.
member.param: The name of the SlugBase character.
The game's current save slot.
member.returns: True if the save file exists, false otherwise.

member.name: M:SlugBase.SaveManager.GetCustomSaveData(RainWorld,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a summary of the content in a SlugBase character's save file.
member.param: The current instance.
The name of the SlugBase character.
The game's current save slot.
member.returns: A summary of the given character's save file.

member.name: T:SlugBase.SceneImageFilter
member.summary: Determines if this image should be included in the scene.
member.remarks: This is intended to filter items based on .
member.param: The instance to check.
member.returns: True if this image should be in the scene, false otherwise.

member.name: T:SlugBase.PlayerManager

member.name: P:SlugBase.PlayerManager.ResourceDirectory
member.summary: Returns a path to the folder containing resources for SlugBase characters.

member.name: P:SlugBase.PlayerManager.CurrentCharacter
member.summary: The custom character that is being played in the current game. This will be null if there is not an ongoing game, or if the current character was not added through SlugBase.

member.name: P:SlugBase.PlayerManager.UsingCustomCharacter
member.summary: True if the current game session uses a player added by SlugBase.

member.name: M:SlugBase.PlayerManager.RegisterCharacter(SlugBase.SlugBaseCharacter)
member.summary: Registers a new character to appear in the select menu.
member.param: The character to register.
member.exception: Thrown when a SlugBase character with this name already exists.
Thrown when a SlugBase character is registered after the game has started.

member.name: M:SlugBase.PlayerManager.GetCustomPlayers
member.summary: Gets all registered SlugBase characters in alphabetical order.
member.returns: A read-only collection containing all registered SlugBase characters.

member.name: M:SlugBase.PlayerManager.GetCustomPlayer(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a SlugBase character by name.
member.param: The name to search for.
member.returns: The character, or null if it was not found.

member.name: M:SlugBase.PlayerManager.GetCustomPlayer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the SlugBase character with the given index. If no such character exists, null is returned.
member.remarks: should be used instead whenever possible.
member.param: The slugcat number of this character.
member.returns: A instace with the given index or null.
